@Version(value="${api_version}")

Package org.jgrapes.http

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    HttpServer
    A converter component that receives and sends byte buffers on a network channel and sends HTTP requests and receives HTTP responses on its own channel.
    InMemorySessionManager
    A in memory session manager.
    LanguageSelector
    A component that attempts to derive information about language preferences from requests.
    ResourcePattern
    A resource pattern can be used to filter URIs.
    Session
    Represents a session.
    StaticContentDispatcher
    A dispatcher for requests for static content, usually files.
    StaticContentDispatcher.ValidityInfo
    Describes an association between a media range and a
    maximum age in seconds.
